title: マチカネタンホイザ登場！

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Once upon a time, in a certain town, there lived an ordinary Umamusume named Omachi-chan.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Working diligently as the poster girl of her family's popular restaurant, Omachi-chan got along well with the customers!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: She smiles happily while eating with everyone!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Oh, wait, that's not right.
Seeing everyone smiling happily as they eat, Omachi-chan smiles happily too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: While living such days, one day, an Umamusume race came on TV!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The customers' smiles grew even brighter! Omachi-chan's heart raced with the intensity of the race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And so! Omachi-chan, who had grown to admire the world of racing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Joined a club, trained, took the exam, and then passed—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Enrolled at Tracen Academy! A happy ending, a happy ending!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Huh, that's it!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yep, that's it! Pretty ordinary, right? The reason I admired it is also a very common Umamusume story.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: I think being able to enroll means it's not exactly 'ordinary.'

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeah.
It's one of Japan's most competitive schools, after all.
The memorable first day of racing through the Twinkle Series together.
Friends—the overly energetic runaway Umamusume, Twin Turbo, and the slightly cynical Umamusume, Nice Nature.
And along with the intelligent Umamusume, Ikuno Dictus, they had come to watch a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So even O-Machi is finally having her debut race, huh—.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey, Matikanetannhauser-san! In the Twinkle Series, do you have any goals or anything!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm~, Nature reporter! Well, yes.
I want to do my best in my own way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The Twinkle Series is a race where lots of strong Umamusume run, after all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's common to not win graded races, and winning a G1 race is just a handful.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: In that situation, if you start aiming for things like the Classic Triple Crown Umamusume or winning the Tenno Sho in both spring and autumn, it's like, whoa!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You have to win consecutive G1 races, which are already super hard!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You gotta wonder how the Umamusume who've achieved that did it, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I get it, I get it...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But you know, that's exactly why I think I want to win too~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Win... I get that too. I get it, but...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If you're going to a place to compete, you normally want to go there to win properly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So for now, first off, without giving up, aim for first place in every race, I guess!

text_block_list.name: Two People
text_block_list.text: Huh!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I like that! Turbo's gonna do that too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That way!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: No, no! I mean, does it really go that way from the flow of the conversation!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I made a proper plan too, see.
Saying that, Matikanetannhauser showed Nice Nature a notebook.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Whoa, you really made one...! It even has meals written down.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmph-hmph!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wow. As always, you have big dreams, or maybe you're fearless...

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Now, now, isn't that her good point?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Chasing big dreams as if it's natural, not everyone can do that.
As if cutting off that conversation, suddenly the entire spectator stands erupted with excitement!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: It's started! The race between McQueen and Teio!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: All Umamusume have entered the gates—they're off!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Teio and McQueen have broken away, just the two of them, charging ahead, zoom zoom zoom!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: As expected of McQueen-san, the idol of stayers! The intensity is on another level~!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Teio-san is said to be the star of this year's classic class, and you can really feel that 'genius' vibe~!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Indeed, both of them are a cut above the rest.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: They've passed the 200m mark! They've left the others far behind, it's a complete one-on-one showdown!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: From here... I'm going for it! Taaaah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I won't let you! Haaaah!
(Waaaaaaaah——!)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Amazing, amazing, that was an amazing race...!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: ...But honestly, I'm glad I wasn't running in it...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: The girls in the back look so down. Can't blame them after having that gap in ability rubbed in their faces...
The cheers born from the geniuses had more than enough heat to sting the hearts of the 'ordinary' Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew! That was an incredible race! Right!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Truly a one-on-one battle between geniuses. It was amazing, really...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's like they don't even have the other Umamusume in their sights! Wow, that was genius-level stuff, gave me chills!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If an ordinary me like me were to try and beat those two... what would it take? Maybe a late charge from behind on the straight?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But Teio's acceleration is amazing too, and to have enough leg left to match that...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm. I guess it's back to building up my body, huh?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Sigh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
.........
Mostly, they get scared, give up, or get dazzled by the sparkle...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's not something you can just get into that mood right away, you know~~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: R-really?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Really. ...I really need to learn from that part of you, sooner or later.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...I'm heading back first.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wha!? Nature~!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, did I say something that weird?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: No! Nice Nature's point is perfectly valid! It's one of your great charms!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Chairwoman!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I heard your voices while out for a walk, by chance! But, setting that aside—

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Actually, I have high hopes for you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: H-h-hopes for me!?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Yes, there are countless Umamusume only you can guide! Please do your very best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: She said that to me! Hehe.
This isn't the first time Yayoi Akikawa has said such words to Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: —Your future is dazzling! I, for one, am very much looking forward to your future achievements!
Whether it's as the 'Chairwoman' who governs the academy, or as herself, thinking of the Umamusume...
Her true intentions are unclear, but it's certain that she has taken an interest in Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Honestly, I don't really understand why she has such expectations of someone like me...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, well, whatever! The fact that she knew about my debut must mean she's been watching over me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm simply really happy that she's taken an interest in me! Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I've decided! From now on, I'll give the Twinkle Series...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll try pretty hard!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Right! Let's try pretty hard together, Trainer!
Regardless of 'pretty hard'... it seems Akikawa Chairwoman's expectations have really struck a chord with her.
And so, the days of aiming for victory began, alongside this 'ordinary,' hardworking, and slightly unfocused girl.
